header: Give your instagram store a new home
description: A store that looks just as good as your brand. Wow your customers with a fluid, well-designed shopping experience.

header: Connect your "link in bio" to your store
description: "DM/call to order" can be frustrating. Make it easy for your customers with a link in your bio that's one click away from your online store.
No more long message threads. No long forms. One click is all it takes to buy anything. It's kinda like magic.

header: Automate receipts and thank you messages
description: Don't leave your customers in the dark. Increase their trust by immediately thanking them for their purchase, issuing a receipt and providing all your contact details.
